2.16: ninb yaag Buaj maaig pc'g kopq uaq teij myenb, “pyenb meib Bua Eei nx'g Zwrtq mivb maa'b! maiq tuvq lovg yia Eei tia Eei pyauq zruj hei.”
2.4: ye-su tau, “aa maa aa'b! weig haiq tiug pun naaiq teij Jauq Paanj Tauj yia? yia Eei zyavb hog maiq kcvb Tauj.”
2.10: kxvq Buaj ninb, “yetg kau myenb Zivq Kc'q ninb Bua pun tiub Kuq hopq Daavg. zuaq myenb hopq Zamq Zivj pun maiq Kuq Eei tiuq. mq paag meib lyrub Kuq uaq Euvg Tauj ib zang.”
2.22: Ga'haaq ye-su taig mivb cvj navb taaib, ninb Eei saib kxj Bua Javj zu'g ninb kxvq naaiq Jruj waag zyrug syenj kivb sru yaag syenj ye-su kxvq Eei waag.
2.12: Ga'haaq ye-su Zauj ninb Eei maa, ninb Eei yrud Bua, Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua mivb Kaa-pe-naa-um muvq yem i ziaj Nxi uaq.
2.15: ye-su zyrug lovg Laav kitq tiub Laavb pin taaib zung yetg zuvq, lyemb vovb, lyemb yuvb, Zwrtq zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq yaag puvj Kiv Tiuq Eaanb Eei tiab, toj kwavg Revg ninb Bua Eei Eaanb.
2.13: uaq zang aaq lamb Tauj siaj mcvg zipq. ye-su zyrug mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb.
2.1: ta'faam Nxi yem kaa-li-li teib puv, Kaa-naa laavd, maaib nxm Zivb Jaab yinb. ye-su Eei maa yaag yem uaq Eei.
2.25: ye-su maiq Qyemj zu'g haiq taub Buaj ninb paamb myenb Navq haiq nx, weig zu'g ninb kanb hiuq tu'q myenb Eei Hruq.

6.18: uaq zang pxvd kxv tomb Ryaauj pwrng Kxiq Jiad laavg.
6.45: trug waag myenb Eei sru fiaq Jyenq kxvq, ‘Tinb huvb kanb xij Faauj ninb Bua yetg zuvq.’ haiq taub haid zavg tiaj Eei waag yaag ho'g hiuq Eei, ninb Bua yetg zuvq xij taaib lxd yia.
6.3: ye-su zyrug faauj Bovb aiq mivb Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua zweid Jyenq uaq.
6.66: yem naaig taaib ye-su Eei saib kxj Zamq Eei Twij prug, maiq kan ye-su a'q.
6.43: ye-su tau ninb Bua, “meib Bua maiq tuvq vib vuvj vopq Eei maa'b!
6.50: haiq taub Eang yem Tinb txvb Fiag taaib Eei Eang hopq maiq zu'g taig.
6.14: zwavj myenb pwatg ye-su zruj naaiq Euvg Bua'g hxvb Eei sig, ninb Bua kxvq, “naaiq se xij taaib Tauj paamb ken uaq taub trug waag myenb a'q.”
6.48: yia zruj yuvd mcvg Eei Eang hopq.
6.69: yia Bua syenj yaag hiuq tu'q meib zruj Tinb huvb Eei Zivb Revg myenb.”
6.34: ninb Bua kxvq, “finb scv aa'b! Toq zanb zang pun naaiq Euvg Eang hopq yia Bua maa'b!”
6.2: myenb Zamq Eei kan Jyenq ninb mivb weig zu'g ninb Bua pwatg ninb zruj Jiaj Bua'g hxvb Eei sig zxg lovj putg pcvg myenb.
6.36: mq paag Navq yia Buaj Jiaj meib Bua nx, meib Bua pwatg Jiaj yia yaag maiq syenj.
6.35: ye-su Buaj ninb Bua, “yia kanb se yuvd mcvg Eei Eang hopq. haiq taub taaib lxd yia, uaq taub yetg liud maiq vxg. haiq taub syenj yia, uaq taub yetg liud maiq Gaatq.
6.24: zwavj myenb pwatg ye-su Zauj saib kxj Bua maiq yem naaig, ninb Bua zyrug pia'g uaq teij Ravq mivb Kaa-pe-naa-um muvq lxd ye-su.
6.71: ye-su Navq naaiq nx kxvq se kxvq zu'g si-mon i-saa-Kaa-li-otg Eei txn, yu-Daatg. maiq kunq ninb zruj uaq teij zyepg Eeig taub saib kxj Eei yetg taub, Ga'haaq ninb maaig ye-su.
6.61: ye-su hiuq tu'q ninb Eei saib kxj Navq naaiq nx vopq naaiq teij waag zyrug kxvq Buaj ninb Bua, “laaij yia kxvq naaiq teij waag meib Bua haid xij Twij prug fai?
6.67: ye-su zyrug naaig kaaj uaq teij zyepg Eeig taub saib kxj, “meib Bua yaag xij kwavg yia fai?”
6.7: fi-lipq tau, “lovg Eig pc'q Nxi Eei kovb zinb maaid Eang Eei ka'naaiq zuvq maiq kauj yetg taub tu'q ti'q tyen.”
6.17: pia'g Ravq huvj Jyenq mivb uaq vaang zi'g Kxiq, Kaa-pe-naa-um muvq. uaq zang, zuvq Mwavj a'q. ye-su yaag maiq kcvb Tauj ninb Bua uaq.
6.58: naaiq se yem Tinb txvb Fiag taaib Eei Eang hopq. se maiq Navq Bua Eei ovb Taaij Eang Eei maa-naa. Eang liud Zxg haib taig Eei. mq paag haiq taub Eang yem Tinb txvb Fiag taaib Eei Eang hopq zyrug tu'q yetg liud zyavb Jyenq.”
6.49: meib Bua Eei ovb Taaib vc'q yem teib puvb Waav Eang maa-naa mq paag ninb Bua taig mig a'q.
6.11: ye-su zyrug zx'q uaq teij Fuaq taaib tauj kauj, lcvd zivb liud Tinb huvb, zyrug pun Gxi zweid Jyenq uaq teij zwavj myenb Eang. Byaud yaag fib Navq Eei pun Gxi, ziuj kx'g myenb xij Zamq fai zo'g.
6.33: weig zu'g Tinb huvb Eei Eang hopq se tovb yem Tinb txvb Fiag taaib pun paamb myenb tu'q zyavb Jyenq uaq taub.”
6.16: luvb maanb Mwavj teij, ye-su Eei saib kxj Bua Fiag Tauj Kxib Len,
6.70: ye-su tau, “yia kinq meib Bua zyepg Eeig taub maiq zeid? mq paag meib Bua maaib taub zruj Yiab kwaiq myenq.”
6.40: weig zu'g yia Eei tia Eei eij se Navq naaiq. haiq taub pwatg ninb Eei txn, yaag syenj Kauj ninb Eei txn, uaq taub zyrug tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg. Tauj Ga'haaq laai uaq Nxi yia yaag xij pun ninb navb taaib.”
6.59: ye-su kxvq naaiq teij waag uaq zang ninb yem Kaa-pe-naa-um muvq Eei wig txvb Faauj myenb.
6.37: ta'faanb yia Eei tia Zeij pun yia Eei myenb yetg zuvq xij taaib lxd yia. haiq taub taaib lxd yia, yia yetg liud maiq kwavg.
6.4: uaq zang aaq lamb teij Tauj yiu-Tai myenb Jiaj siaj mcvg zipq a'q.
6.51: yia zruj zyavb Jyenq Eei Eang hopq yem Tinb txvb Fiag taaib. haiq taub Eang naaiq Euvg Eang hopq, uaq taub tu'q yetg liud zyavb Jyenq. yia pun Eei Eang hopq se tovb yia kanb Eei xq weig pun paamb myenb tu'q zyavb Jyenq.”
6.62: uaq Euvg sij kxvq meib Bua pwatg yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, faauj Tauj zinb Daavg yem Eei txvj, meib Bua Navq haiq nx?
6.12: zwavj myenb zyrug Eang peuq Revg. ye-su Buaj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua, “mivb syru Eang zevg uaq teij taaib, maiq tuvq kwavg yetg aaj.”
6.46: naaiq maiq zeid kxvq maaib haiq taub tu'q pwatg Jiaj zavg tiaj. Kuvj yem Tinb huvb taaib uaq taub tu'q pwatg Jiaj zavg tiaj Navq.
6.13: tovb uaq teij pyaa nxm Fuaq zwavj myenb Eang peuq Revg, mq paag saib kxj Bua cvj syru zevg uaq teij tapq pwavq zyepg Eeig nxm Daan.
6.26: ye-su tau, “yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua, meib Bua lxd yia maiq zeid laaij pwatg yia zruj Bua'g hxvb Eei Javb hog, se weig zu'g meib Bua tu'q Fuaq Eang peuq.
6.28: ninb Bua zyrug naaig ye-su, “yia Bua xij zu'g zruj haiq Euvg Zivj funj Tinb huvb Eei kov?”
6.54: haiq taub Eang yia Eei xq, hopq yia Eei Ryaamq, uaq taub maaib yetg liud Eei mcvg. Ga'haaq laai uaq Nxi yia yaag xij pun ninb navb taaib.
6.68: si-mon pi-te tau, “zyruq aa'b! yia Bua xij zu'g mivb kan haiq taub? se tovb meib kanb Eei waag haib pun myenb tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg.
6.63: se sivj livb pun myenb maaib zyavb mcvg. paamb myenb maiq haib pun myenb maaib zyavb mcvg. yia kxvq Eei waag haib pun meib Bua tu'q sivj livb. sivj livb yaag pun meib Bua tu'q zyavb mcvg.
6.8: maaib taub ye-su Eei saib kxj, tovb si-mon pi-te Eei yrud, an-Daa-lu, kxvq,
6.9: “yem naaiq maaib taub txn maaib pyaa nxm lovg Byaub Baa-li zruj taaib Eei Fuaq Zauj i taub Byaud. mq paag myenb Dovg naaig Zamq Navq haiq nx haib pun tu'q Gxi?”
6.32: ye-su Buaj ninb Bua, “yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua, se maiq zeid mo-se pun yem luvb taaib uaq Euvg zyen Eang hopq. se yia Eei tia zx'q yem luvb Eei zyen Eang hopq Jiu pun meib Bua.
6.21: saib kxj Bua zyrug a'Neiq zipq ninb pia'g Ravq. Ravq lyemb zeib Tauj ninb Bua xij mivb uaq nxm txvj mig a'q.
6.64: mq paag meib Bua maaib teij maiq syenj.” weig zu'g ye-su yem kxn mtaaib hiuq tu'q uaq teij myenb haiq taub maiq syenj ninb, haiq taub xij maaig ninb.
6.57: zyavb Jyenq Eei zavg tiaj Paaiq yia taaib, yia yaag weig ninb tu'q zyavb Jyenq. Navq naaig, haiq taub Eang yia Eei xq, uaq taub yaag weig yia tu'q zyavb Jyenq.
6.23: maaib teij Ravq yem Ti-Be-lyetq muvq taaib tivb Jyenq uaq Kxib Len, nitq zyruq zx'q Fuaq lcvd zivb liud Tinb huvb zyrug pun zwavj myenb Eang uaq nxm txvj.
6.6: ye-su Kuvj Navq naaiq nx naaig weig seij fi-lipq. ninb kanb xij Navq haiq nx zruj ninb zuvq hiuq mig a'q.
6.55: weig zu'g yia Eei xq Zauj yia Eei Ryaamq se zyen Eang hopq.
6.44: maiq maaib haiq taub haib taaib lxd yia Zwrtq liud zavg tiaj, tovb Paaiq yia taaib uaq taub, yua'g ninb taaib. haiq taub taaib lxd yia, Tauj Ga'haaq laai uaq Nxi yia zyrug pun ninb navb taaib.
6.20: ye-su Buaj ninb Bua, “maiq tuvq kamb Riaj. se tovb yia a'q.”
6.5: ye-su Zau Myen mavg, pwatg myenb Zamq Eei taaib ninb uaq zyrug naaig kaaj fi-lipq, “Bua xij zu'g mivb haaij maaid ka'naaiq kauj pun naaiq teij zwavj myenb Eang?”
6.56: haiq taub Eang yia Eei xq yaag hopq yia Eei Ryaamq, uaq taub Zauj yia Jwavg mcvg zyavb. yia yaag Zauj uaq taub Jwavg mcvg zyavb.
6.53: ye-su Buaj ninb Bua, “yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua, sij kxvq meib Bua maiq Eang paamb myenb Eei txn Eei xq, yaag maiq hopq ninb Eei Ryaamq, yem meib Bua ka'Euad maiq maaib zyavb mcvg a'q.
6.19: saib kxj Bua Rcv Ravq mivb pyaa Ju'q ki-lo Eei txvj, pwatg ye-su yavb uamb ming taaib nitq fatq ninb Bua Eei Ravq, hc'q ninb Bua kamb Riaj haig.
6.38: weig zu'g yia yem Tinb txvb Fiag taaib mq paag maiq zeid sweib yia kanb Eei eij zruj. yia taaib zruj ei Paaiq yia taaib uaq taub Eei eij Navq.
6.31: yia Bua Eei ovb Taaij yem teib puvb Waav tu'q Eang maa-naa Navq kivb sru fiaq Jyenq kxvq, ‘ninb pun yem luvb taaib Eei Eang hopq ninb Bua Eang.’+”
6.52: yiu-Tai myenb haid naaiq teij waag zyrug Rcv Jiad Jaaj taaib kxvq, “naaiq laanb myenb Navq haiq nx haib pun ninb Eei xq Bua Eang?”
6.65: ninb zyrug kxvq, “weig naaiq yia kxvq Jiaj Buaj meib Bua Eei, Zwrtq liud zavg tiaj pun taaib uaq teij, maiq maaib haiq taub haib taaib lxd yia.”
6.27: meib Bua maiq tuvq Zwrtq Qa'q lxd haib waaig Eei Eang hopq. xij zu'g lxd pun myenb tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg uaq Euvg Eang hopq. yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, xij pun naaiq Euvg Eang hopq meib Bua, weig zu'g yia Eei tia, Tinb huvb, Jiu hatg maad pun yia, Navq Bx'q Jyenq yenj nx, pun Ziv yia hxpg Revg ninb Eei Hruq.”
6.60: ye-su Eei saib kxj Zamq Eei haid liud naaiq teij waag zyrug kxvq, “naaiq teij Faauj Eei waag za'kevb a'g tu'q haig. haiq taub haib mwavj tu'q lcb?”
6.41: yiu-Tai myenb zyrug vopq ye-su weig zu'g ninb kxvq, “yia se yem Tinb txvb Fiag taaib Eei Eang hopq.”
6.1: Ga'haaq ye-su Jiaj uaq vaang zi'g kaa-li-li Kxib txn (cvj maaib kanb nxm Buaj heug Ti-Be-lyetq).
6.39: Paaiq yia taaib uaq taub Eei eij se Navq naaiq. tovb ninb Zeij pun yia uaq teij myenb, ninb maiq xij yia pun laaib zitg yetg taub. Tauj Ga'haaq laai uaq Nxi, xij yia pun ninb Bua yetg zuvq navb taaib.
6.47: yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua, haiq taub syenj yia, uaq taub maaib yetg liud Eei mcvg.
6.10: ye-su kxvq, “Buaj zwavj myenb zweid Fiag maa'b!” uaq teij txvj miaq Zamq Eei. zwavj myenb zyrug zweid Fiag. taan mJavg txn maaib leib maiq ko pyaa Zin taub.
6.25: zwavj myenb lxd pwatg ye-su yem uaq vaang zi'g Kxiq ninb Bua naaig, “finb scv aa'b! zyavb haaij taaib Tauj naaiq?”
6.22: ta'Eeig Nxi Zxg yem uaq vaang zi'g Kxiq uaq teij zwavj myenb hiuq tu'q yem uaq Kuvj maaib Du'g Pruj Ravq Navq. ye-su yaag maiq zeid Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj pia'g uaq Pruj Ravq, Kuvj saib kxj Bua kanb mivb Navq.
6.42: ninb Bua kxvq, “naaiq taub se yo-sepq Eei txn, ye-su, maiq zeid? ninb Eei tiaj maag Bua hiuq tu'q Eei. ninb Navq haiq nx haib kxvq ninb yem Tinb txvb Fiag taaib?”
6.15: ye-su hiuq tu'q myenb xij taaib zx'q ninb, aapq ninb zruj huvb, ninb kanb zyrug simq Gxi cvj faauj uaq Jiaj Bov mig a'q.
6.29: ye-su tau, “Tinb huvb xij meib Bua zruj Eei kov se xij zu'g syenj ninb Paaiq taaib uaq taub.”
6.30: ninb Bua zyrug Buaj ye-su, “uaq Euvg meib xij zruj haiq Euvg Bua'g hxvb Eei Javb hog pun yia Bua pwatg zyrug haib syenj meib? meib xij Navq haiq nx zruj?

13.18: “yia maiq zeid kxvq Tauj meib Bua yetg zuvq. yia kinq taaib uaq teij yia hiuq Eei, mq paag sig xij Zwrtq taaib txij naaiq teij kivb sru Eei waag. kivb sru kxvq, ‘Zauj yia Jwavg Naavj Eang Eei myenb Byenq Hruq pun yia.’
13.8: pi-te kxvq, “yia yetg liud maiq pun meib Raauj yia Eei zauj.” ye-su tau, “sij kxvq yia maiq Raauj meib Eei zauj nx, yavb naaiq Jiaj meib Zauj yia maiq maaib meib Eei pwrng a'q.”
13.33: “yia Eei fu'Jweiq aag, yia cvj Zauj meib Bua yem teij tavb Navq. meib Bua xij lxd yia mq paag Navq yia Buaj Jiaj uaq teij zruj Lo Eei yiu-Tai myenb nx, ib zang yia cvj kxvq Buaj meib Bua, ‘yia mivb Eei txvj meib Bua maiq haib mivb.’
13.3: ye-su hiuq tu'q zavg tiaj zx'q maang mwrtg Jiu pun yem ninb Eei puab Diaq, yaag hiuq tu'q ninb yem Tinb huvb taaib cvj xij Rwrnj Tauj Tinb huvb uaq.
13.32: sij kxvq Tinb huvb weig yia tu'q Favb laavg, Tinb huvb yaag xij pun yia tu'q Favb laavg yaag lyemb zeib tu'q.
13.21: ye-su kxvq liud naaiq teij waag ninb haid Hruq mun haig, Raub haig, zyrug kxvq, “yia Buaj zyen meib Bua, meib Bua maaib taub xij maaig yia.”
13.35: sij kxvq meib Bua laanb Namq laanb, zwavj myenb zyrug hiuq tu'q meib Bua zruj yia Eei saib kxj.”
13.14: yia zruj meib Bua Eei zyruq yaag zruj meib Bua Eei saib tiaj Tevj meib Bua Raauj liud zauj. Navq naaig meib Bua xij zu'g laanb Tevj laanb Raauj zauj.
13.23: maaib taub saib kxj, tovb ye-su Namq uaq taub, zweid nitq ye-su.
13.6: Raauj Tauj si-mon pi-te, pi-te kxvq Buaj ninb, “zyruq aa'b! meib xij Raauj yia Eei zauj?”
13.34: ib zang yia pun tiub syavb livg meib Bua, Buaj meib Bua laanb xij zu'g Namq laanb. yia Navq haiq nx Namq meib Bua, meib Bua xij zu'g Navq uaq nx laanb Namq laanb.
13.2: ye-su Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua Eang luvb Mwavj uaq zang, saa-taan zuvq Duaq liud si-mon i-saa-Kaa-li-otg Eei txn, yu-Daatg, pun ninb Namq Zwrtq xij maaig ye-su.
13.36: si-mon pi-te naaig ye-su, “zyruq aa'b! meib xij mivb haaij?” ye-su tau, “yia mivb Eei txvj, ib zang meib kan yia mivb maiq tu'q. mq paag Ga'haaq meib xij kan yia mivb.”
13.20: yia Buaj zyen meib Bua, haiq taub zipq yia Paaiq mivb uaq taub, ninb yaag zipq yia. haiq taub zipq yia, ninb yaag zipq Paaiq yia taaib uaq taub a'q.”
13.24: si-mon pi-te zyrug Na'q mGxvq Buaj uaq taub saib kxj, “naaig kaaj, ninb kxvq haiq taub?”
13.28: Jwavg tiab Eei myenb maiq maaib haiq taub mevb pc'g ye-su weig haiq tiug Navq naaiq nx kxvq.
13.7: ye-su tau, “yia ib zang Navq naaiq nx zruj meib maiq mevb pc'g, mq paag maaib Nxi meib zyrug hiuq tu'q a'q.”
13.29: weig zu'g yu-Daatg kruj Eaanb Bua'g, maaib teij laaig ye-su heug ninb mivb maaid Jiaj zipq Qyemj lovg Eei ka'naaiq, fai txb Eaanb mivb pun myenb Jomg myenb.
13.19: sig maiq kcvb Zwrtq yia Jaab Daavg Buaj meib Bua. sig Zwrtq uaq zang meib Bua zyrug syenj yia se yetg liud zyavb Jyenq uaq taub.
13.17: ib zang meib Bua hiuq tu'q naaiq teij Jauq. sij kxvq meib Bua ei Jyenq zruj zyrug maaib Fyenb yrub a'q.
13.38: ye-su tau, “meib za'kevb Eung weig yia siaq mcvg taig fai? yia kxvq za'g Buaj meib, Jai zuvq maiq kcvb Gaaij, meib maiq Eyemg yia pua Rung.”
13.31: yu-Daatg Zwrtq mivb, ye-su kxvq, “ib zang yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, tu'q Favb laavg. Tinb huvb yaag weig yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, tu'q Favb laavg.
13.30: yu-Daatg Eang liud naaiq aaj Fuaq zyrug mivb mig a'q. uaq zang yaag Mwavj a'q.
13.27: yu-Daatg Eang liud uaq aaj Fuaq, saa-taan zyrug pia'g ninb Eei Hruq mig a'q. ye-su kxvq Buaj yu-Daatg, “meib xij zruj haiq Euvg, kaanq mivb zruj a'q.”
13.11: ye-su hiuq tu'q haiq taub xij maaig ninb Zivj taaib kxvq, “meib Bua maaib taub maiq Zivb Revg.”
13.5: yaag zx'q uam toj Jyenq punb, Fiag puad Tevj saib kxj Bua Raauj zauj. Raauj liud, ninb lovg sai Jyenq uaq Kwaaiq si'g Jaauq sxtq Gaai.
13.9: si-mon pi-te tau, “zyruq aa'b! uaq Euvg maiq taan Raauj yia Eei zauj Navq. lyemb yia Eei puad Zauj mGxvq Raauj maa'b!”
13.16: yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua, pru maiq kaub Lo zyruq. Paaiq mivb Eei myenb maiq kaub Lo Paaiq ninb mivb uaq taub.
13.37: pi-te naaig, “zyruq aa'b! yia weig haiq tiug ib zang maiq haib kan meib mivb? yia Eung weig meib siaq mcvg taig.”
13.4: ninb zyrug yem uaq tiab Jiad sin taaib Jaiq ka'Eiag uaq yemg lwi, zx'q si'g Jaauq sai Jyenq Jaaiq,
13.10: ye-su kxvq, “haiq taub Raauj liud sin, zyavb sin zyrug Zivb Revg a'q, Kuvj xij zu'g Raauj zauj Navq. meib Bua se Zivb Revg Eei, mq paag maiq zeid meib Bua taub taub.”
13.22: saib kxj Bua, meib mavg yia, yia mavg meib, Namq maiq hiuq ye-su kxvq zu'g haiq taub.
13.12: ye-su Raauj liud saib kxj Bua Eei zauj, ninb cvj zx'q ninb Eei lwi zu'q Jyenq mivb zweid ninb Eei txvj. ninb naaig saib kxj Bua, “yia Navq naaiq nx zruj pun meib Bua, meib Bua mevb pc'g Eei fai?
13.15: yia zruj Euvg zeiq pun meib Bua zwrtg. yia Navq haiq nx Tevj meib Bua zruj liud, meib Bua yaag xij zu'g Navq uaq nx zruj.
13.13: meib Bua heug yia zruj saib tiaj yaag zruj zyruq. meib Bua kxvq tu'q hxpg Eei weig zu'g yia za'kevb zeid a'q.
13.1: siaj mcvg zipq zinb Daavg uaq Nxi, ye-su hiuq tu'q ninb xij zu'g leib paamb ken Rwrnj zavg tiaj uaq Eei zyavb hog Tauj a'q. ye-su Namq yem paamb ken syenj ninb uaq teij myenb, yaag pun ninb Bua hiuq tu'q ninb Namq Tauj taaub Tauj mweid.
13.26: ye-su tau, “yia kua'q aaj Fuaq pun haiq taub, se tovb uaq taub a'q.” ye-su zyrug kua'q aaj Fuaq pun si-mon i-saa-Kaa-li-otg Eei txn, yu-Daatg.
13.25: uaq taub saib kxj zyrug Dev mivb kaub fatq teij naaig ye-su, “zyruq aa'b! meib kxvq haiq taub?”

12.18: weig zu'g zwavj myenb haid kxvq ye-su zruj naaiq Rung Bua'g hxvb Eei Javb hog, ninb Bua zyrug mivb zipq.
12.45: haiq taub pwatg yia, yaag pwatg Paaiq yia taaib uaq taub.
12.3: uaq zang, maa-li-yaa zx'q zyepg faam luvd zyen haig, Jaaij haig Eei naa-Daa yrub Daav toj ye-su Eei zauj, cvj lovg ninb kanb Eei Ba'pyei sxtq. yrub Eei Qiaj Daav pwavq yetg nxm pyauq.
12.43: ninb Bua a'Neiq myenb Zev ninb Bua kaub Zamq tu'q Tinb huvb Zev.
12.50: yia hiuq tu'q ninb Eei livg haib pun myenb tu'q yetg liud Eei mcvg. weig naaiq yia kxvq Eei waag yetg zuvq se ei yia Eei tia Buaj yia kxvq.”
12.14: ye-su lxd tu'q taub maa-li Zaan zyrug keb Jyenq taaib, Navq kivb sru fiaq Jyenq kxvq nx,
12.48: haiq taub Gemb yia, maiq mwavj yia Eei waag, maaib taub xij syemq ninb. Tauj Ga'haaq laai uaq Nxi yia kxvq Eei waag xij syemq ninb Eei zwid.
12.34: zwavj myenb kxvq, “leib latg Buaj yia Bua, ki-tug xij yetg liud yem. uaq Euvg meib Navq haiq nx haib kxvq paamb myenb Eei txn xij zu'g myenb lyepg faauj Lav? naaiq taub paamb myenb Eei txn tovb haiq taub?”
12.2: yem uaq ninb Bua Beng tonj Naavj hrug ye-su. maa-Taa liug leid ninb Bua. laa-saa-latq yaag Zauj ye-su Bua Jwavg tiab Eang Naavj.
12.36: maaib Fav Eei zyavb hog meib Bua xij zu'g syenj Kauj Fav. meib Bua zyrug penj yem Fav Eei myenb.” kxvq liud naaiq teij waag, ye-su Zwrtq mivb pivj ninb Bua mig a'q.
12.35: ye-su Buaj ninb Bua, “Fav cvj Zauj meib Bua yem trug Navq. Zxg maaib Fav Eei zyavb hog kaanq Jyenq yavb Jauq mivb a'q. mRiaj Mwavj xij taaib om Jyenq meib Bua. haiq taub yem Mwavj yavb Jauq, uaq taub maiq hiuq tu'q ninb mivb haaij.
12.24: yia kxvq zyen Buaj meib Bua, maaib yetg nxm Zu'q maiq zwavj Fiag Dau huq mivb nx, mtaaib tovb uaq Du'g nxm Zu'q Navq. mq paag sij kxvq zwavj Fiag Dau huq mivb zyrug Zwrtq taaib tu'q Zamq a'q.
12.7: ye-su kxvq, “maiq tuvq kxvq ninb maa'b! ninb maaib Eei sweib ninb lyrub Tauj pyopq yia uaq nxm Nxi.
12.17: pwatg ye-su heug laa-saa-latq yem zruq navb Zwrtq taaib uaq teij zwavj myenb zruj zxvb zevj kxvq Revg naaiq teij Jaub lrug.
12.49: weig zu'g yia Eei waag maiq zeid ei yia kanb Eei Hruq Namq Zwrtq taaib kxvq. zavg tiaj Paaiq yia taaib Buaj yia kxvq haiq Euvg yaag xij zu'g Navq haiq nx kxvq.
12.11: weig zu'g ninb Eei sig Zwrtq taaib pun myenb Zamq kwavg Jyenq sai myenb pyeiq syenj ye-su.
12.33: (ye-su Navq naaiq nx kxvq weig pun Ziv ninb xij zu'g Navq haiq nx taig.)
12.16: taaub tavb ye-su Eei saib kxj Bua maiq mevb pc'g naaiq teij Jauq. mq paag ye-su taig, Tinb huvb cvj pun ninb navb taaib Taaib ninb zruj Lo, ninb Bua Zivj Javj zu'g kivb sru fiaq Jyenq Navq naaiq nx kxvq Tauj ye-su, yaag Javj zu'g myenb Navq naaiq nx zruj pun ye-su.
12.40: “Tinb huvb pun ninb Bua Eei mziv mcvb, yaag pun ninb Bua Eei Hruq vcvg. Riaj ninb Bua Eei mziv haib mavg tu'q pwatg, ninb Bua Eei Hruq yaag haib mevb pc'g zyrug Win Rwrnj taaib pun yia zxg lovj ninb Bua.”
12.37: maiq kunq ye-su zruj Bua'g hxvb haig Eei Javb hog Dovg naaig Zamq pun yiu-Tai myenb pwatg, ninb Bua Zxg maiq syenj ninb.
12.4: maaib taub ye-su Eei saib kxj, yu-Daatg i-saa-Kaa-li-otg, tovb xij maaig ye-su uaq taub zyrug kxvq,
12.12: ta'Eeig Nxi, taaib Jiaj zipq uaq teij zwavj myenb haid kxvq ye-su taaib aaq lamb Tauj ye-lu-saa-lem.
12.46: yia taaib pia'g paamb ken weig zruj nxm Fav. haiq taub syenj yia, maiq zu'g yem Mwavj ka'Euad.
12.13: ninb Bua zyrug nanq Jyenq taaub nxmb Zwrtq mivb zipq, yaag heug Jyenq kxvq, “ho-saa-naa! Toq Zeij fu'q pun tevq zyruq Eei Buaj taaib uaq taub. Toq Tinb huvb Zeij fu'q pun i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei huvb tiaj.”
12.26: haiq taub xij Tevj yia zruj pru, xij zu'g kan Jyenq yia mivb. yia yem haaij, pru yaag Zauj yia yem uaq. haiq taub zruj yia Eei pru, yia Eei tia xij Taaib ninb.
12.28: aa tia aa'b! Toq pun tia Eei Buaj tu'q Favb laavg.” cvj maaib Qiaj yem uaq luvb kxvq, “yia zuvq pun yia Eei Buaj tu'q Favb laavg. yia cvj xij pun tu'q Favb laavg.”
12.8: meib Bua zanb zang maaib myenb Jomg myenb Zauj meib Bua yem, mq paag meib Bua maiq tu'q yia Zauj meib Bua yetg liud yem.”
12.9: maaib yiu-Tai myenb Zamq haid kxvq ye-su yem Be-Taa-ni laavd. ninb Bua zyrug mivb uaq maiq zeid Kuvj lxd ye-su Navq. ninb Bua yaag xij mavg taig mivb, ye-su pun navb taaib uaq taub laa-saa-latq.
12.32: yia yem Dau zu'g myenb lyepg faauj Lav uaq zang, yia xij yua'g taub taub myenb taaib lxd yia.”
12.21: naaiq teij Janj taaib lxd fi-lipq, tovb yem kaa-li-li scvq, Betg-sai-Daa muvq taaib uaq taub saib kxj, kxvq Buaj ninb, “tomb kxj aag, yia Bua xij pwavb ye-su og.”
12.23: ye-su tau ninb Bua, “ib zang yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, tu'q Favb laavg Eei zyavb hog zuvq Tauj a'q.
12.6: yu-Daatg Navq naaiq nx kxvq se maiq zeid ninb maaib Hruq Kxb lyenb myenb Jomg myenb. se weig zu'g ninb kanb zruj Janb za'g. ninb Tevj kruj ye-su Bua Eei tomb zwavj Eaanb Bua'g mq paag ninb kanb yaag Pinj Eaanb Zwrtq.
12.44: ye-su lovg Qiaj Lo Eei cvj kxvq, “haiq taub syenj yia, maiq taan syenj yia Navq. ninb yaag syenj Paaiq yia taaib uaq taub.
12.20: mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb Jiaj siaj mcvg zipq uaq zang, maaib teij Janb kikg yaag kan Jyenq mivb zavg Tinb huvb.
12.5: “zruj haiq Euvg maiq txb naaiq teij yrub mivb maaig tu'q Eaanb taaib pun myenb Jomg myenb? naaiq funj taaib hxpg faamb pc'q Nxi Eei kovb zinb nyaa.”
12.19: faa-li-sij myenb zyrug laanb Buaj laanb, “mavg maa'b! Bua zruj maiq Zwrtq haiq Euvg. luvb Diaq myenb kan Revg ninb mig a'q.”
12.38: Navq naaig weig pun trug waag myenb, i-saa-yaa, Eei waag Zwrtq taaib txij Revg. i-saa-yaa kxvq, “zyruq aa'b! maaib haiq taub syenj yia Bua zunb Eei waag? zyruq pun haiq taub tu'q pwatg ninb Eei Qa'q?”
12.31: ib zang Tauj zyavb hog Tinb huvb xij tivg luvb Diaq myenb Eei zwid. kunq paamb ken uaq taub yaag xij zu'g zung Zwrtq.
12.27: “ib zang yia Hruq Raub haig. yia xij zu'g Navq haiq nx kxvq ni? xij zu'g kxvq, ‘aa tia aa'b! Toq tia Fruj yia maiq zu'g pwavb naaiq teij Kruq Eei sig’ fai? maiq zeid! yia taaib weig xij zu'g syrug naaiq Euvg Kruq.
12.41: i-saa-yaa Navq naaiq nx kxvq weig zu'g ninb tu'q pwatg ye-su Eei Favb laavg yaag kxvq Tauj ninb.
12.1: siaj mcvg zipq maiq kcvb Tauj, zinb Daavg Ju'q Nxi, ye-su mivb Be-Taa-ni laavd, tovb taig mivb ye-su pun navb taaib uaq taub laa-saa-latq yem Eei laavd.
12.39: weig naaiq ninb Bua maiq haib syenj. weig zu'g i-saa-yaa cvj kxvq,
12.47: haiq taub haid yia Eei waag yaag maiq ei Jyenq zruj, yia maiq syemq ninb Eei zwid. yia taaib maiq zeid xij syemq paamb myenb Eei zwid. yia taaib weig Fruj ninb Bua.
12.10: sai myenb pyeiq Bua zyrug taaq za'eij xij lyemb laa-saa-latq taij,
12.25: haiq taub Kuvj Namq ninb kanb Eei mcvg, uaq taub zyrug zu'g kwavg ninb Eei mcvg. mq paag haiq taub maiq Kxb fi'q ninb Eei mcvg, uaq taub zyrug kruj Jyenq ninb Eei mcvg Tauj yetg liud.
12.22: fi-lipq zyrug mivb Buaj an-Daa-lu. ninb Bua i taub zyrug mivb Buaj ye-su.
12.42: maaib zruj Lo Eei yiu-Tai myenb Zamq Eei syenj ye-su. mq paag ninb Bua maiq txv zwavj Eyemg weig zu'g ninb Bua kamb Riaj faa-li-sij myenb xij zung ninb Bua Zwrtq wig txvb.
12.15: “si-on zivb aa'b! maiq tuvq kamb Riaj. meib Eei huvb tiaj keb Jyenq maa-li Zaan taaib.”
12.29: sruq Jyenq uaq Eei zwavj myenb haid uaq Euvg Qiaj Bwi, maaib teij kxvq, “Ba'ov Bwi.” maaib teij kxvq, “finb myenb Zauj ninb kxvq waag.”
12.30: mq paag ye-su Buaj ninb Bua, “naaiq teij Qiaj Bwi se weig meib Bua, maiq zeid weig yia.

15.18: “sij kxvq paamb myenb Rxv meib Bua, meib Bua xij zu'g Javj Jyenq ninb Bua Rxv yia Daavg.
15.8: sij kxvq meib Bua zyavb pyruq kitq, meib Bua zyrug pun myenb Taaib yia Eei tia. Navq naaig meib Bua zyrug penj yia Eei saib kxj.
15.3: yia Faauj Eei waag se Navq taaq Meib Gwaab tweiq nx, liug leid meib Bua Eei Hruq.
15.21: weig meib Bua zruj yia Eei myenb, ninb Bua xij zruj naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig pun meib Bua, laaij ninb Bua maiq hiuq tu'q Paaiq yia taaib uaq taub.
15.14: sij kxvq meib Bua ei Jyenq yia Buaj Eei waag zruj, meib Bua zyrug zruj yia Eei kxb yrud a'q.
15.23: haiq taub Rxv yia, yaag Rxv yia Eei tia.
15.6: haiq taub maiq zyavb Jyenq yia, zyrug Navq tiub Meib Gwaab zu'g Pitq kwavg, Gaai mivb yaag zu'g Raud taaib tapq trub Raug puaq kwavg mivb.
15.2: haiq tiub Gwaab zyavb Jyenq yia yaag maiq zyavb pyruq nx, ninb Pitq kwavg. haiq tiub Gwaab zyavb pyruq, ninb cvj taaq Gxi tweiq pun zyavb pyruq kaub kitq.
15.20: meib Bua xij zu'g Javj Jyenq yia Buaj Jiaj meib Bua naaiq teij waag, ‘pru maiq kaub Lo zyruq.’ sij kxvq myenb zruj to'g pun yia, ninb Bua yaag xij zruj to'g pun meib Bua. sij kxvq ninb Bua ei Jyenq yia Eei waag, ninb Bua zyrug ei Jyenq meib Bua Eei waag.
15.24: sij kxvq yia maiq taaib yem ninb Bua Bu'Dovj zruj myenb maiq kcvb zruj Jiaj Eei sig nx, ninb Bua zyrug maiq maaib zwid. mq paag ib zang ninb Bua tu'q pwatg liud yia zruj Eei sig, ninb Bua Zxg Rxv yia, yaag Rxv yia Eei tia.
15.7: sij kxvq meib Bua zyavb Jyenq yia, yia Eei waag yaag zyavb Jyenq meib Bua, meib Bua Toq haiq Euvg meib Bua zyrug tu'q uaq Euvg a'q.
15.19: sij kxvq meib Bua kwei paamb ken, paamb myenb xij Namq meib Bua Navq Namq Zauj ninb Bua kwei paamb ken uaq teij. mq paag meib Bua maiq kwei paamb ken. yia kinq meib Bua Zwrtq taaib. weig naaiq paamb myenb Rxv meib Bua.
15.17: naaiq se yia Eei livg, laanb xij zu'g Namq laanb.
15.27: meib Bua yaag xij zu'g Tevj yia zruj zxvb zevj weig zu'g yem kxn Tauj ib zang meib Bua Zauj yia yem.
15.11: “naaiq teij waag yia Buaj meib Bua, pun meib Bua haib tu'q yia Eei Fyenb yrub, yaag Fyenb yrub Tauj taaub.
15.5: “yia se a'vung Mei. meib Bua se a'vung Gwaab. haiq taub zyavb Jyenq yia, yia yaag zyavb Jyenq ninb, uaq taub zyrug zyavb pyruq kitq a'q. meib Bua leib Gxi yia nx, meib Bua maiq haib zruj haiq Euvg.
15.9: “zavg tiaj Navq haiq nx Namq yia, yia yaag Navq uaq nx Namq meib Bua. meib Bua xij zu'g Kauj wrnq yia Namq myenb Eei Hruq.
15.16: maiq zeid meib Bua kinq yia, se yia kinq meib Bua. yia Paaiq meib Bua Zwrtq mivb zyavb pyruq Zamq, tovb yetg liud maiq haib waaig Eei pyruq. Navq naaig meib Bua tevq yia Eei Buaj Tevj zavg tiaj Toq haiq Euvg, ninb zyrug Zeij uaq Euvg pun meib Bua.
15.4: meib Bua xij zu'g zyavb Jyenq yia, yia zyrug zyavb Jyenq meib Bua. Meib Gwaab maiq zyavb Meib maag, Gwaab maiq haib zyavb pyruq. meib Bua yaag fib Navq Eei. sij kxvq maiq zyavb Jyenq yia nx, meib Bua maiq haib zyavb pyruq.
15.10: sij kxvq meib Bua ei Jyenq yia Eei livg zruj, yia zyrug zanb zang Namq meib Bua, Navq yia ei Jyenq yia Eei tia Eei livg zruj, ninb zyrug zanb zang Namq yia.
15.22: “sij kxvq yia maiq taaib Faauj Jiaj ninb Bua, ninb Bua maiq maaib zwid. mq paag ib zang, ninb Bua maiq maaib txvj Jaiq zwid a'q.
15.12: yia Eei livg se Navq naaiq, laanb xij zu'g Namq laanb Navq yia Namq meib Bua uaq nx.
15.15: yavb naaiq Jiaj, yia maiq heug meib Bua zruj pru, weig zu'g pru maiq hiuq tu'q ninb Eei zyruq zruj haiq Euvg. ib zang yia heug meib Bua zruj yia Eei kxb yrud weig zu'g yia Eei tia Buaj haiq Euvg yia, yia Buaj Revg meib Bua mig a'q.
15.13: maiq maaib haiq taub haib Namq ninb Eei kxb yrud kaub Zamq Jiaj naaiq. se myenb weig ninb Eei kxb yrud siaq mcvg taig.
15.1: “yia se zyen a'vung Mei. yia Eei tia zruj kruj Wivj uaq taub.
15.26: “yia xij Paaiq Tevj myenb uaq taub taaib lxd meib Bua. ninb yem zavg tiaj uaq taaib, tovb ninb pun myenb hiuq tu'q zyen leid uaq taub sivj livb. ninb taaib zyrug Tevj yia zruj zxvb zevj.
15.25: naaiq teij sig Zwrtq taaib weig pun txij Revg fiaq Jyenq ninb Bua Eei leib latg naaiq teij waag, ‘ninb Bua Rxv yia yaag maiq maaib kxnb pcvj.’

11.18: Be-Taa-ni laavd leib ye-lu-saa-lem zivb pua ki-lo Jauq Eei txvj.
11.45: Navq naaig taaib mavg maa-li-yaa uaq teij yiu-Tai myenb Zamq pwatg ye-su zruj naaiq teij sig zyrug syenj ninb.
11.3: maa-Taa Bua i muab sia'q zyrug pun waag mivb Buaj ye-su, “zyruq aa'b! tovb meib Namq uaq taub putq pcvg mig a'q.”
11.43: ye-su kxvq liud naaiq teij waag ninb Qiaj Lo Eei heug Jyenq kxvq, “laa-saa-latq aa'b! Zwrtq taaib maa'b!”
11.50: meib Bua maiq hiuq fai? pun yetg taub myenb taig tiq pc'g fivj se kaub lovj yetg fivj myenb zu'g myetg Revg.”
11.14: ye-su zyrug kxvq za'g Buaj ninb Bua, “laa-saa-latq taig mig a'q.
11.48: sij kxvq Bua sweib ninb Navq naaiq zruj Jyenq mivb, myenb zyrug syenj ninb Revg a'q. Navq naaig, lo-maa Jyen xij pavg naaiq nxm Qavj zruj waaig Bua zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyauq, yaag zruj waaig Bua Eei fivj.”
11.34: ye-su naaig, “meib Bua txb ninb mivb zavj haaij?” ninb Bua tau, “zyruq aa'b! taaib mavg maa'b!”
11.2: (naaiq taub maa-li-yaa se tovb lovg Daav Eei yrub toj zyruq Eei zauj, yaag lovg ninb kanb Eei Ba'pyei sxtq. putq pcvg uaq taub laa-saa-latq se maa-li-yaa Eei naud.)
11.36: uaq teij yiu-Tai myenb kxvq, “mavg kaaj, ninb Dovg naaig Namq laa-saa-latq.”
11.24: maa-Taa tau, “zeid Eei, yia hiuq tu'q Tauj Ga'haaq laai uaq Nxi, zwavj myenb navb taaib uaq zang, ninb yaag cvj navb taaib.”
11.7: Zivj taaib kxvq Buaj ninb Eei saib kxj, “Bua cvj mivb yu-Dia scvq a'q.”
11.17: ye-su mivb Tauj Be-Taa-ni laavd uaq zang, haid myenb kxvq laa-saa-latq zavj Jyenq tu'q pyei Nxi a'q.
11.49: naaiq kwanb myenb maaib taub, Buaj heug Kaa-yaa-faatq, tovb uaq Havj zruj tomb sai myenb. ninb kxvq, “meib Bua maiq hiuq tu'q haiq Euvg.
11.11: ye-su Navq naaiq nx kxvq liud ninb cvj kxvq, “Bua Eei txig laa-saa-latq mFxmb mig a'q, mq paag yia xij mivb heug ninb Eia taaib.”
11.33: ye-su pwatg maa-li-yaa Eyemq, kan maa-li-yaa taaib uaq teij yiu-Tai myenb yaag Eyemq, ninb zyrug haid Hruq mun haig, Raub haig.
11.16: To-matq, tovb myenb heug suvb kub vwaad uaq taub, kxvq Buaj yem uaq Eei saib kxj, “Bua lomb Rxib kan Jyenq saib tiaj mivb x'g? Bua zyrug tu'q Zauj ninb taig.”
11.40: ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb, “yia Buaj Jiaj meib maiq zeid? sij kxvq meib syenj, meib xij tu'q pwatg Tinb huvb Eei Favb laavg.”
11.37: mq paag maaib teij kxvq, “ninb pun mziv mcvb Eei myenb haib mavg tu'q pwatg. uaq Euvg ninb maiq haib pun naaiq taub myenb maiq taig fai?”
11.4: ye-su haid naaiq teij waag ninb kxvq, “laa-saa-latq putq naaiq nxm pcvg mq paag setq mweid ninb maiq taig. ninb putq weig pun myenb Taaib Tinb huvb. naaiq nxm pcvg yaag xij pun myenb Taaib Tinb huvb Eei txn.”
11.51: Kaa-yaa-faatq kxvq naaiq teij waag se maiq zeid ei ninb kanb Eei Hruq Namq Zwrtq taaib kxvq. se weig zu'g uaq Havj ninb zruj tomb sai myenb zyrug kxvq zinb hod waag, kxvq ye-su xij zu'g weig yetg fivj yiu-Tai myenb taig.
11.12: saib kxj Bua tau, “zyruq aa'b! sij kxvq ninb mFxmb nx, ninb haib lovj Eei.”
11.46: mq paag maaib teij Rwrnj mivb kxvq Revg ye-su zruj Eei Jaub lrug pun faa-li-sij myenb mwavj.
11.13: ye-su kxvq Eei eij leid se laa-saa-latq taig mig a'q. mq paag saib kxj Bua laaig laa-saa-latq Kuvj mFxmb Navq.
11.26: haiq taub zyavb Jyenq yaag syenj yia, uaq taub yetg liud maiq taig. naaiq meib syenj Eei fai?”
11.28: maa-Taa Navq naaiq nx kxvq liud, ninb Rwrnj mivb pivj Jyenq Buaj ninb Eei Riad, maa-li-yaa, “saib tiaj Tauj taaib a'q. ninb yaag heug meib.”
11.54: weig naaiq ye-su maiq Navq zinb Daavg txv zwavj yrub yu-Dia scvq pun yiu-Tai myenb pwatg. ninb mivb nxm laavd heug e-faa-im, nitq teib puvb Waav fatq Eei, Zauj ninb Eei saib kxj Bua yem uaq.
11.8: saib kxj Bua tau, “saib tiaj aa'b! Jiaj taaib maiq kcvb maaib Bu'ziaj Nxi, yem uaq Eei yiu-Tai myenb xij zx'q la'pyeiq zov meib nyaa. meib Zxg cvj xij mivb uaq?”
11.9: ye-su tau, “yetg Nxi maaib zyepg Eeig nxm zyavb hog Eei Fav maiq zeid? haiq taub luvb Nxi zang yavb Jauq, ninb maiq Di'q zu'g Dxpg weig zu'g ninb mavg tu'q pwatg paamb ken Eei Fav.
11.32: maa-li-yaa mivb Tauj ye-su uaq, yetq pwatg zyrug kweig Fiag ninb Eei zauj ka'Len kxvq, “zyruq aa'b! sij kxvq meib yem naaiq, yia Eei naud maiq taig.”
11.21: maa-Taa kxvq Buaj ye-su, “zyruq aa'b! sij kxvq meib yem naaiq nx, yia Eei naud maiq taig.
11.57: uaq zang sai myenb pyeiq Zauj faa-li-sij myenb Jaa zyavj waag kxvq, sij kxvq haiq taub hiuq tu'q ye-su yem haaij xij zu'g mivb Buaj ninb Bua, ninb Bua zyrug haib mivb zx'q ninb.
11.23: ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb, “meib Eei naud cvj xij navb taaib.”
11.6: ninb haid myenb kxvq laa-saa-latq putq Jyenq pcvg, ninb Zxg yem ninb yem uaq nxm txvj i Nxi liud
11.55: aaq lamb teij Tauj yiu-Tai myenb Jiaj siaj mcvg zipq, myenb Zamq yem faamb puv feij lrug mivb ye-lu-saa-lem zivb weig ei Jyenq leid saaj wij Zivj taaib Jiaj zipq.
11.44: taig mivb uaq taub myenb zyrug Zwrtq taaib a'q. ninb Eei puab zauj Zxg maaib Dia Reng Jyenq. Myen yaag maaib Dia pwav Jyenq. ye-su Buaj ninb Bua, “Govb Tevj ninb Jaiq Gxi, puvj ninb maa'b!”
11.20: maa-Taa haid kxvq ye-su taaib a'q, ninb zyrug Zwrtq mivb zipq. mq paag maa-li-yaa Zxg yem uaq pyauq.
11.5: ye-su Namq haig maa-Taa Bua i muab sia'q Zauj laa-saa-latq.
11.56: ninb Bua yem zavg Tinb huvb Eei pyaub Len lxd ye-su. laanb naaig laanb, “aa, meib Navq haiq nx Namq? taaij ninb maiq taaib naaiq Jiaj zipq saa'b?”
11.53: yem naaig Nxi taaib, zruj Lo Eei yiu-Tai myenb Jiad kxn taaq za'eij taij ye-su.
11.19: yiu-Tai myenb Zamq Eei taaib mavg maa-Taa Zauj maa-li-yaa, Tevj ninb Bua Jaiq Raub weig zu'g ninb Bua Eei naud taig.
11.38: ye-su cvj haid Hruq mun, Raub haig, zyrug mivb uaq zruq. uaq nxm zruq se Bcvb Kwrtq. maaib nxm la'pyeiq Lo Eei Bc'g Jyenq Kwrtg Daavg.
11.31: Zauj maa-li-yaa yem pyauq Tevj ninb Jaiq Raub uaq teij myenb, pwatg maa-li-yaa Waav Jyenq Jiad sin Zwrtq, ninb Bua zyrug kan Jyenq mivb, laaig ninb mivb uaq zruq Eyemq mq pei.
11.52: yaag maiq zeid weig uaq fivj taig Navq. ninb yaag taig weig syru zunq Tinb huvb Eei naamb Erud, se yem Raanj uaq teij, kapq zunq taaib penj yetg kwanb.
11.27: maa-Taa tau, “zyruq aa'b! yia syenj Eei. yia syenj meib za'kevb ki-tug, Tinb huvb Eei txn, tovb xij Fiag taaib yem naaiq paamb ken uaq taub.”
11.41: uaq teij myenb zyrug zx'q Gxi la'pyeiq. ye-su Zau Myen mavg kub vwaaig luvb kxvq, “aa tia aa'b! yia lcvd zivb weig zu'g tia mwavj yia Eei waag.
11.1: maaib taub myenb, Buaj heug laa-saa-latq, putq pcvg mig a'q. ninb yem Be-Taa-ni laavd, tovb maa-li-yaa Zauj ninb Eei txg, maa-Taa, yem uaq nxm laavd.
11.39: ye-su kxvq, “zx'q Gxi la'pyeiq maa'b!” taig uaq taub laa-saa-latq Eei txg, maa-Taa, kxvq Buaj ye-su, “zyruq aa'b! zavj Jyenq tu'q pyei Nxi a'q. taaij zweij haig.”
11.47: naaiq teij sai myenb pyeiq Zauj faa-li-sij myenb zyrug heug kunq sig wig Eei myenb kapq zunq Zaavb laavb. ninb Bua kxvq, “aa, Bua xij zu'g Navq haiq nx zruj? naaiq laanb myenb zruj Bua'g hxvb Eei Javb hog Zamq haig.
11.10: mq paag sij kxvq ninb luvb mwrnd zang yavb Jauq nx, ninb Di'q zu'g Dxpg weig zu'g maiq maaib Fav ziuj ninb.”
11.25: ye-su kxvq Buaj ninb, “yia se tovb pun myenb navb taaib maaib mcvg zyavb uaq taub. haiq taub syenj yia, maiq kunq ninb taig mivb, ninb cvj xij navb taaib.
11.22: mq paag, yia hiuq tu'q ib zang meib Tevj Tinb huvb Toq haiq Euvg, Tinb huvb xij pun uaq Euvg meib.”
11.42: yia hiuq tu'q tia haiq zang yaag mwavj yia, mq paag yia Navq naaiq nx kxvq se weig pun sruq ka'Len naaiq teij myenb syenj tia Paaiq yia taaib.”
11.15: mq paag weig Tevj meib Bua syenj yia, yia a'Neiq yia maiq tu'q Zauj ninb yem. Bua mivb ninb uaq x'g?”
11.29: maa-li-yaa haid naaiq teij waag zyrug syepg syepq Eei Jiad sin mivb ye-su uaq.
11.30: uaq zang ye-su maiq kcvb pia'g laavd, Zxg yem maa-Taa pwavb ninb uaq nxm txvj.

1.18: maiq maaib haiq taub pwatg Jiaj Tinb huvb. Kuvj maaib ninb Eei Do'g txn, tovb yem zavg tiaj Eei ka'Len uaq taub, pun Bua hiuq tu'q Tinb huvb Navq.
1.45: fi-lipq lxd pwatg naa-Taa-naa-en zyrug kxvq, “tovb mo-se fiaq Jyenq uaq leib latg sru, Zauj Tinb huvb Eei zwavj trug waag myenb fiaq Eei sru zyavq Jyenq kxvq uaq laanb myenb, yia Bua tu'q pwatg a'q. se yo-sepq Eei txn, naa-saa-letq muvq Eei ye-su.”
1.3: Tinb huvb lovg ninb zeij Zwrtq maang mwrtg. maiq maaib yetg Euvg Tinb huvb maiq lovg tod zeij.
1.43: ta'Eeig Nxi ye-su tivg Hruq mivb kaa-li-li scvq. ninb pwatg fi-lipq zyrug kxvq Buaj ninb, “taaib kan yia og.”
1.50: ye-su kxvq, “weig zu'g yia kxvq yia pwatg meib yem vovb Exj Dyavb kxn meib Zivj taaib syenj? meib zuvq xij tu'q pwatg sig kaub Lo Jiaj naaiq.”
1.14: tod penj taub paamb myenb yem Bua Bu'Dovj. ninb maaib enb Zeij Zauj zyen leid pwavq Revg. yia Bua tu'q pwatg ninb Eei Favb laavg, se weig zu'g ninb zruj zavg tiaj Eei Do'g txn tu'q taaib Eei Favb laavg.
1.48: naa-Taa-naa-en naaig ye-su, “meib Navq haiq nx hiuq tu'q yia?” ye-su tau, “fi-lipq maiq kcvb heug meib uaq zang, meib yem uaq vovb Exj Dyavb kxn, yia pwatg liud meib a'q.”
1.34: yia pwatg liud a'q, zyrug zruj zxvb zevj Buaj meib Bua, naaiq taub se Tinb huvb Eei txn.”
1.2: zinb Daavg yem kxn uaq zang, tod Zauj Tinb huvb yem.
1.36: pwatg ye-su Jiaj Jauq, yo-han zyrug kxvq, “mavg maa'b! Tinb huvb Eei pa'ki yuvb txn.”
1.35: ta'Eeig Nxi yo-han Zauj i taub ninb Eei saib kxj cvj sruq Jyenq uaq.
1.24: faa-li-sij myenb Paaiq taaib uaq teij myenb
1.7: ninb taaib Tevj Fav zruj zxvb zevj pun maang myenb haib syenj.
1.17: Tinb huvb lovg mo-se pun Bua tu'q leib latg, mq paag lovg ye-su ki-tug pun Bua tu'q ninb Eei en Zauj zyen leid.
1.49: naa-Taa-naa-en kxvq, “saib tiaj aa'b! meib za'kevb Tinb huvb Eei txn. meib zruj i-saa-laa-en myenb Eei huvb.”
1.11: ninb taaib Tauj ninb kanb Eei teib puv, ninb kanb Eei myenb yaag maiq zipq ninb.
1.33: yia yaag maiq hiuq ninb tovb haiq taub, mq paag Paaiq yia taaib lovg uam Tevj myenb Jiaj leid uaq taub Buaj yia, ‘meib pwatg sivj livb Fiag taaib yem haiq taub Eei sin, tovb naaiq taub xij lovg sivj livb Tevj myenb Jiaj leid.’
1.16: ninb Eei en Lo haig zyrug zanb zang Zeij fu'q pun Bua.
1.40: haid yo-han kxvq zyrug kan Jyenq ye-su mivb uaq teij i taub, maaib taub zruj si-mon pi-te Eei yrud, an-Daa-lu.
1.37: uaq teij i taub saib kxj haid yo-han Navq naaiq nx kxvq, ninb Bua zyrug kan Jyenq ye-su mivb.
1.4: tod zruj zyavb mcvg Eei kxnb Ewrnb. naaiq Euvg mcvg txb Fav taaib ziuj paamb myenb.
1.51: ye-su cvj kxvq Buaj naa-Taa-naa-en, “yia Buaj zyen meib Bua, meib Bua xij pwatg luvb kcvb Gxi, yaag pwatg Tinb huvb Eei finb myenb yem yia, paamb myenb Eei txn, kub vwaaig faaub faauj Fiab Fiag.”
1.12: mq paag zipq ninb yaag syenj Kauj ninb uaq teij, ninb pun maaib leid penj Tinb huvb Eei naamb Erud.
1.46: naa-Taa-naa-en naaig kaaj, “haib maaib haiq Euvg lovj Eei yem naa-saa-letq muvq Zwrtq fai?” fi-lipq kxvq, “taaib mavg maa'b!”
1.13: ninb Bua penj Tinb huvb Eei naamb Erud se maiq zeid ei paamb myenb Eei Ryaamb fei fai ei paamb myenb Eei eij yuvd. Tinb huvb kanb zruj ninb Bua Eei tia.
1.26: yo-han tau, “yia lovg uam Tevj myenb Jiaj leid. mq paag cvj maaib taub yem meib Bua Bu'Dovj, meib Bua yaag maiq hiuq tu'q ninb.
1.28: naaiq teij yetg zuvq sig yem Jx-Dcn Daaib Eei tov puv mcvj, Be-Taa-ni laavd Zwrtq, tovb yo-han Tevj myenb Jiaj uam Eei leid uaq nxm txvj.
1.8: ninb kanb maiq zeid zruj naaiq Fav. ninb Kuvj Tevj Fav zruj zxvb zevj Navq.
1.9: naaiq Fav se zyen haig Eei Fav yaag pia'g paamb ken ziuj Fav luvb Diaq myenb maanb.
1.32: yo-han cvj zruj zxvb zevj kxvq, “yia pwatg sivj livb Navq nx'g Go yem uaq luvb Fiag taaib yem ninb Eei sin.
1.21: ninb Bua cvj naaig, “uaq Euvg, meib tovb haiq taub? meib tovb e-li-yaa fai?” yo-han tau, “maiq zeid.” ninb Bua cvj naaig, “Navq naaig, meib tovb uaq taub trug waag myenb fai?” yo-han tau, “maiq zeid lx'g.”
1.23: yo-han lovg trug waag myenb, i-saa-yaa, Eei waag tau ninb Bua. ninb kxvq, “yia tovb yem teib puvb Waav Qiaj Lo Eei heug Jyenq kxvq, ‘xij zu'g Kxi Jauq za'g Eei liug leid zipq zyruq.’+”
